D61okhov was holding the Englishman's hand and clearly and distinctly repeating the terms of the bet, addressing himself particu- larly to Anatole and Pierre. 
D61okhov was of medium height, with curly hair and light-blue eyes. He was about twenty- five. Like all infantry officers he wore no mus- tache, so that his mouth, the most striking feature of his face, was clearly seen. The lines of that mouth were remarkably finely curv
